ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Be very afraid....
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t really agree. We are fairly weak at soloing and not very good damage dealers in groups. More over, we are weak in raids. I agree with Aftathott on this
ygData.messageBody:
I don't really agree. We are fairly weak at soloing and not very good
damage dealers in groups. More over, we are weak in raids.

I agree with Aftathott on this one. Verant did a very good job balancing
Bards in solo and group situations. But we are far less valuable in raid
situations.

Raids are one area VI should definitely spend some time on before
releasing Luclin. I hope they address XP in raids, class balance in raids
and communication (chat) in raids.

More and more of the game is around raids where the top Warrior, Rogue,
Shammy, Chanter and Cleric take the XP. The 6th spot is very likely a Monk
for pulling, but mages, wizzies and SKs are all more preferred than Bards.

Tzeetch
The Commune, Xegony




--- "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@...> wrote:

Ugh....

Its funny... the more I play my bard and the higher she gets, I find
myself
sometimes not telling people everything I can do, kind of keeping a low
profile, hoping that they don't notice. Seriously, don't laugh, its just
that bards seem very overpowered to me at higher levels, then again 60
shaman with Can IV.... I used to think all level 60 were equally powerful
but I'm changing my thoughts.

I hope nobody else figures this out!

Tani, 54 Bardette
Halana, 60 Shaman
Solusek Ro
